class ase2sprkkr.sprkkr.spacegroup_info.SpacegroupInfo(atoms, symmetry=True, dataset=None)[source]ÔÉÅ

Class, that carry information about spacegroup and symmetry of a structure

Class hierarchy


Constructor

Parameters:

  • atoms (sprkkr_atoms.SPRKKRAtoms)

  • dataset (Optional[Dict])

__init__(atoms, symmetry=True, dataset=None)[source]ÔÉÅ
Parameters:

  • atoms (SPRKKRAtoms) ‚Äì ASE atoms object desribed by the SpacegroupInfo

  • symmetry ‚Äì Whether the by-symmetry-equivalent sites will share properties

  • dataset (Dict | None) ‚Äì SPGLib dataset - a dictionary, containing many informations about the symmetry and spacegroup of the structure. If it is not provided, and spacegroup is not None the spacegroup is recomputed to obtain the dataset, if the dataset is requested.
